transArray.content: The check-in environment is very good, the room is very clean and very hygienic. The breakfast is also very good. If you are on a business trip, I recommend you to choose their restaurant. The service is good and the environment is great.

Dear guests: Hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Thank you very much for your recognition of the room attendants and room hygiene. We are very happy to bring you a good stay experience. The hotel strictly abides by the Huazhu Group's room cleaning procedures. We will continue to work hard to provide every guest with a comfortable and secure stay. All hotel staff look forward to your next visit and wish you a happy life.
